International Telecommunication Union Online Certification Course
=================================================================

by [commpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/commpic/ "Posts by commpic")
 | Oct 20, 2020 | [Faculty](https://fke.utm.my/category/faculty/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/banner.png)

Open for registration.

International Telecommunication Union (ITU) COE online certification course on

**“Human Exposure to Radio Frequency Electromagnetic Fields”**

from

**23 November to 6 December 2020**.

Interactive live lectures, invited industry speakers, case studies and ITU certification

Find out more and register at [https://rb.gy/rpxn9w](https://rb.gy/rpxn9w?fbclid=IwAR07mjHBBZmQP2_HJTEucb4fRyD1CL8iPvI0ig6I9qPV1yDSWc0gCoO2rTU)

**Registration deadline:** 16 November 2020
